snippet: The family of Ezell Ford, an unarmed black man who was shot and killed by Los Angeles police officers on Monday evening, plans to file a wrongful-death lawsuit against the Police Department.
abstract: Family of Ezell Ford, unarmed black man who was shot and killed by Los Angeles police officers, plans to file wrongful-death lawsuit against city's Police Department.
lead_paragraph: The family of Ezell Ford, an unarmed black man who was shot and killed by Los Angeles police officers on Monday evening, plans to file a wrongful-death lawsuit against the Police Department.

headline.main: California: Police to Face Suit Over Killing of Unarmed Man
headline.print_headline: California: Police to Face Suit Over Killing of Unarmed Man
